items.name: Alex Chen
items.text: Tool X has significantly improved my workflow. The comprehensive suite of security tools saves me hours of time.

items.name: Sarah Johnson
items.text: The encoding/decoding tools and hash generators have become essential in my daily work. Highly recommended!

items.name: Mohammed Al-Farsi
items.text: Markdown Pro integration is seamless, and the AI assistant provides valuable insights during security assessments.

items.name: Keiko Tanaka
items.text: The UI is beautiful and the tools are powerful. The steganography detection feature caught vulnerabilities our other tools missed.
